=== Roadmap ===

Here you should provide a list of things you plan on doing. Include links to where these are discussed online and on mailing lists.

* ''Indiana LinuxFest'' - help with planning, advocate Ubuntu
* ''Support'' - Continue to provide local support via mailing list, forums, and IRC
* ''Contribution Education'' - Work with local LUGs to educate people about non-programming ways they can help make Free Software/Ubuntu better (helping with bugs, documentation, etc.)
* ''Installfest/BootCamp'' - Provide more in-depth assistance with in person gatherings
* ''Release Parties'' - A place and time for local Ubunteros to celebrate.
